metadata.title: CVE-2021-47260 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFS:Fix a potential NULL dereference in nfs_get_client() None of the callersare expecting NULL returns from nfs_get_client() so this code will lead toan Oops. It's better to return an error pointer. I expect that this is deadcode so hopefully no one is affected.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
